mapper.select: SELECT t1.*, ai.name as apartment_name, ri.room_number, gi.name as gi_name, gi.url from (select * from lease_agreement la where la.name = #{username} and la.is_deleted = 0) t1 left join apartment_info ai on t1.apartment_id = ai.id and ai.is_deleted = 0 left join room_info ri on t1.apartment_id = ri.apartment_id and t1.room_id = ri.id and ri.is_deleted = 0 left join graph_info gi on gi.item_id = t1.room_id and gi.item_type = 2 and gi.is_deleted = 0

select pt.name as payment_type_name, lt.month_count as lease_term_month_count, lt.unit as lease_term_unit from (select * from lease_agreement la where id = 1 and is_deleted = 0) t1 left join lease_term lt on t1.lease_term_id = lt.id and lt.is_deleted = 0 left join payment_type pt on t1.payment_type_id = pt.id and pt.is_deleted = 0
